original: Östman, Carl Gustaf, civilingenjör SVR, hyggnadschef, Norrköping, f. 11/7/92 i Örnsköldsvik av Gustaf Ö. o. Augusta Backman. G. 1. 18 m. Elsa-Lena Lundström, d. 46; 2. 48 m. Lisa Margareta Bergström. Barn: Bengt f. 23, odönt. kand. — Stud :ex. i Umeå 11, avg:ex. fr. KTH (V) 16. Utr. stud:res. Anst. v. A-B Ing:-firman Unander & Jonson i Sthlm 16-18, vattenledn :ing. v. Norrköp. stads byggn :kont. 18, ibyggn :chef i Norrköp. sed. 42 (41). V. ordf. i Norrköp. auto-mobil- o. flygkl., ordf. i Norrköp. modell- o. segelflygkl. 35-43, led. av styr.
translated: Östman, Carl Gustaf, Civil Engineer of the Royal Swedish Academy of Engineering Sciences, Construction Manager, Norrköping, born on July 11th, 1892 in Örnsköldsvik to Gustaf Ö. and Augusta Backman. Married 1. in 1918 to Elsa-Lena Lundström, who passed away in 1946; 2. in 1948 to Lisa Margareta Bergström. Children: Bengt, born in 1923, deceased. Bachelor of Science examination from Umeå University in 1911, graduated from the Royal Institute of Technology (V) in 1916. International study trips. Employed by the engineering firm Unander & Jonson in Stockholm from 1916 to 1918, water pipeline engineer at the Building Office of Norrköping in 1918, promoted to the position of construction manager in Norrköping in 1942 (1941). Vice chairman of the Norrköping Automobile and Aviation Club, chairman of the Norrköping Model and Glider Flying Club from 1935 to 1943, and a member of the board.

memberOf.name: Norrköping Model and Glider Flying Club
